original_text: Solomon had made a bronze platform five cubits long, five cubits wide, and three cubits high, and had set it in the court, and he stood on it. Then he knelt on his knees in the presence of all the assembly of Israel, and spread out his hands toward heaven,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 일찍이 놋으로 대를 만들었으니 길이가 다섯 규빗이요 너비가 다섯 규빗이요 높이가 세 규빗이라 뜰 가운데에 두었더니 그가 그 위에 서서 이스라엘의 모든 회중 앞에서 무릎을 꿇고 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: Solomon had made a bronze platform
five cubits long, five cubits wide, and three cubits high
sentences.korean_translation: 길이가 다섯 규빗, 너비가 다섯 규빗, 높이가 세 규빗이었고

sentences.original_text: and had set it in the court
Then he knelt on his knees
in the presence of all the assembly of Israel
and spread out his hands toward heaven,
